means: 保证（做某事、遵守协议或遵从安排等）( commit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The government has committed billions toward defraying the costs of the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府已承诺拨款数十亿支付战争的开支。

sentence.Network_en: Groups like ours are committed to eradicating homophobia, racism and sexism.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些像我们这样的团体致力于消除对同性恋的憎恶、种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentence.Network_en: He was electrocuted for a murder committed when he was 17.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因17岁时犯下的谋杀罪而被处以电刑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: they committed outrages on innocent citizens ., 他们对无辜的市民犯下了暴行.
大四词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... commit v commitment n 承诺，保证；承担的义务 committed adj 忠诚的，负责的 committee n 委员会.

大四词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... commit v commitment n 承诺，保证；承担的义务 committed adj 忠诚的，负责的 committee n 委员会.

list.abs: 阀门优秀制造商-江苏诚一阀门有限公司 ... 特殊阀门 Special Valve 服务承诺 Service commitment 订购须知 Ordering.
组织承诺(organizational commitment)也有译为“组织归属感”、“组织忠诚”等。组织承诺一般是指个体认同并参与一个组织的强度。
TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... commit crime 犯罪 commit suicide 自杀 commod 方便.
求英语六级高级... ... 17．做出共同努力 make joint efforts 19．致力于/ 投身于 be committed 20．不可推卸的义务 unshakable duty.

entry.def: If someone commits a crime or a sin, they do something illegal or bad.

example.ex: I have never committed any crime...
This is a man who has committed murder.

entry.def: If someone commits suicide, they deliberately kill themselves.

example.ex: There are unconfirmed reports he tried to commit suicide.
example.tran: 有未经证实的报道说他曾企图自杀。

entry.def: If you commit money or resources to something, you decide to use them for a particular purpose.

example.ex: They called on Western nations to commit more money to the poorest nations...
example.tran: 他们呼吁西方国家向极端贫困国家投入更多的钱。

example.ex: The government had committed billions of pounds for a programme to reduce acid rain...
example.tran: 政府已经给一个旨在减少酸雨的方案拨了几十亿英镑。

entry.def: If you commit yourself to something, you say that you will definitely do it. If you commit yourself to someone, you decide that you want to have a long-term relationship with them.

example.ex: I would advise people to think very carefully about committing themselves to working Sundays...
example.tran: 我建议大家慎重考虑一下答应周日工作的问题。

example.ex: I'd like a friendship that might lead to something deeper, but I wouldn't want to commit myself too soon...
example.tran: 我希望拥有一份能进一步发展的友谊，但又不想太快作出承诺。

entry.def: If you do not want to commit yourself on something, you do not want to say what you really think about it or what you are going to do.

example.ex: It isn't their diplomatic style to commit themselves on such a delicate issue...
example.tran: 对这样一个微妙的问题明确表态并非他们的外交风格。

example.ex: She didn't want to commit herself one way or the other.
example.tran: 不管怎样，她都不想明确表态。

entry.tran: 把…正式送进(医院、监狱等)
entry.def: If someone is committed to a hospital, prison, or other institution, they are officially sent there for a period of time.

example.ex: Arthur's drinking caused him to be committed to a psychiatric hospital.
example.tran: 阿瑟由于酗酒被送进一家精神病医院。

entry.def: In the British legal system, if someone is committed for trial, they are sent by magistrates to stand trial in a crown court.

example.ex: He is expected to be committed for trial at Liverpool Crown Court.
example.tran: 预计他会被移交利物浦高等刑事法庭。

entry.def: If you commit something to paper or to writing, you record it by writing it down. If you commit something to memory, you learn it so that you will remember it.

example.ex: She had not committed anything to paper about it...
example.tran: 关于这件事她未曾写下只言片语。

example.ex: I'll repeat that so you can commit it to memory.
example.tran: 我会重复一下，好让你们记住。

means.word_mean: 1. bound or obligated, as under a pledge to a particular cause, action, or attitude;
2. associated in an exclusive sexual relationship

auth_sentence.content: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Britain has never committed to the idea of Europe.

auth_sentence.content: The Welsh government had already committed to keeping GCSEs.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Welsh government had already committed to keeping GCSEs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Welsh government had already committed to keeping GCSEs.

auth_sentence.content: More committed Yet others see no point in worrying.
auth_sentence.res_content: More committed Yet others see no point in worrying.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More committed Yet others see no point in worrying.

Sentence.sentence: Violation of a rule is misconduct even ifit is committed with good intentions?
it is committed with good intentions
You are pointing out the errors he has committed.
But most woman are not committed careerists.
The court eventually freed Jackson after the police found the man who had really committed the crimes.

sentences.en: a committed member of a political party
remain committed to one’s youthful ideal
sentences.cn: 坚持不懈地追求自己年轻时的理想
